keyword: calories in a baguette from panera
title: Calories in a Panera Baguette
meta_description: Learn calories in a baguette from Panera, including full nutrition facts like carbs, protein, fat, and sodium for the whole French baguette.
assumptions: Whole French Baguette from Panera Bread; standard bakery-fresh, no toppings or additions; approximately 150 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact size; values based on average Panera data. Check Panera's official nutrition info for precision.

quick_answer.text: A Panera baguette contains about 290 calories and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a full Panera baguette?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 calories for the whole French Baguette.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a baguette from Panera?
faqs.a: About 58 g of carbohydrates, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Panera baguette low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 1.5 g total fat per baguette.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Panera baguette?
faqs.a: Around 560 mg, mainly from the dough ingredients.
It provides 10 g of protein per whole baguette.
